name: market for concrete, 20MPa | concrete, 20MPa | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21702/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;The dataset represents 1m3 of ready-mix and self construction 20 MPa concrete in Peru; this dataset covers the period from 2014 to 2016.  A transport distance of 30km is assumed.;Average transportation distance was taken from literature (30km).

From concrete plant gate, with concrete mixer truck already loaded (ready -mix) and from the store (self-construction).

This activity ends at the construction site. The dataset includes the concrete and its transportation to the construction site. Losses due to concrete returned from the construction site have been accounted in the concrete production dataset.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The production volume and current working plants of 2016 is considered.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset represents the current distances for ready mix concrete production in Peru
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: This dataset represents the current technology for ready mix concrete production in Peru

exchanges.description:
Estimated value. Most of the ready to mix concrete is dispatched where there is a high demand concentration. Cities and important building sites are then the biggest markets for ready to mix concrete. Concrete is always dispatched close to ready to mix factory to minimize transport cost but also because of setting time (limitation of approximately 2 hours of workability) (ASTM, 2004). 
In Bogota, the average distance from the ready to mix plant and the building site is 12km by mix one way(Holcim, 2017). In smaller cities the distance can be larger. 
We use a value of 30km and a density of 2400 kg/m3 to calculate the ton.km of a transport by truck.

ASTM. C 94 Ready-Mixed Concrete (2004).

Holcim. (2017). Visit of Concrete facility - Holcim Puente Aranda. Bogota
